scripts.minify:js: for f in src/*.js; do terser "$f" -o "dist/$(basename "$f" .js).js" -c -m done
scripts.minify:css: for f in src/*.css; do postcss -o "dist/$(basename "$f" .css).css" "$f"; done
scripts.minify:html: for f in src/*.html; do html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments "$f" -o "dist/$(basename "$f" .html).html"; done
scripts.build: npm run minify:js & npm run minify:css & npm run minify:html
